languages.text: "Вы — слишком короткоживущее племя, чтобы не покушаться на заветы мертвого бога. Столь любимые тобой законы ныне вряд ли содержат хотя бы одно слово, не переписанное в угоду новым поколениям мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Вы — слишком короткоживущее племя, чтобы не покушаться на заветы мертвого бога. Столь любимые тобой законы ныне вряд ли содержат хотя бы одно слово, не переписанное в угоду новым поколениям монкай".

languages.text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Вы — слишком короткоживущее племя, чтобы не покушаться на заветы мертвого бога. Столь любимые тобой законы ныне вряд ли содержат хотя бы одно слово, не переписанное в угоду новым поколениям мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Yours is a too short-lived tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

"Yours is a too short-lived tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

"Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

"Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

"Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

"Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

languages.text: 「お前たちの種族はあまりにも短命だ。死せる神の教義に一度も手を加えずに済んだはずがあるまい。お前たちが大切にしている法とやらも、新たな世代のモン＝ケイどもに合わせて書き換えられていない言葉など、一語たりとも残っていないのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちの種族はあまりにも短命だ。死せる神の教義に一度も手を加えずに済んだはずがあるまい。お前たちが大切にしている法とやらも、新たな世代のモン＝ケイどもに合わせて書き換えられていない言葉など、一語たりとも残っていないのではないか？」

languages.text: "Euer Stamm ist zu kurzlebig, als dass Ihr nie das Dogma Eures toten Gottes verletzt hättet. Ich bezweifle, dass Eure heißgeliebten Gesetze auch nur ein einziges Wort enthalten, dass nicht schon nach dem Gusto neuer Generationen von Chem-Pan-Sey umgeschrieben wurde."
languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Stamm ist zu kurzlebig, als dass Ihr nie das Dogma Eures toten Gottes verletzt hättet. Ich bezweifle, dass Eure heißgeliebten Gesetze auch nur ein einziges Wort enthalten, dass nicht schon nach dem Gusto neuer Generationen von Chem-Pan-Sey umgeschrieben wurde."

languages.text: « La vie de votre espèce est trop courte pour que vous n'ayez jamais empiété sur le dogme de votre dieu mort. Je doute que vos précieuses lois contiennent le moindre mot qui n'ait pas été réécrit pour satisfaire aux exigences de nouvelles générations de mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « La vie de votre espèce est trop courte pour que vous n'ayez jamais empiété sur le dogme de votre dieu mort. Je doute que vos précieuses lois contiennent le moindre mot qui n'ait pas été réécrit pour satisfaire aux exigences de nouvelles générations de mon-keigh. »

languages.text: «Vuestra ralea es demasiado efímera para trascender el dogma de vuestro dios muerto. Dudo que tus preciadas leyes contengan una sola palabra que no se haya reescrito alguna vez para complacer a las nuevas generaciones de mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Vuestra ralea es demasiado efímera para trascender el dogma de vuestro dios muerto. Dudo que tus preciadas leyes contengan una sola palabra que no se haya reescrito alguna vez para complacer a las nuevas generaciones de mon-keigh».

languages.text: “你们的种族实在是太短命了，甚至根本没机会篡改你们那位尸皇的教义。我怀疑，你们那些所谓的重要律法，里面的每个字恐怕都被改写过，好让最新的这代猴子受益。”
languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “你们的种族实在是太短命了，甚至根本没机会篡改你们那位尸皇的教义。我怀疑，你们那些所谓的重要律法，里面的每个字恐怕都被改写过，好让最新的这代猴子受益。”

languages.text: "Kabilen uzun süre ayakta kalmamış, ölü tanrınızın dogmasını çiğnememeniz doğal. Kıymetli kanunlarınızda gelecek mon-keigh nesillerine hitaben değiştirilmemiş tek bir yeni sözcük varsa ne olayım."
languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Kabilen uzun süre ayakta kalmamış, ölü tanrınızın dogmasını çiğnememeniz doğal. Kıymetli kanunlarınızda gelecek mon-keigh nesillerine hitaben değiştirilmemiş tek bir yeni sözcük varsa ne olayım."

languages.original_text: "Yours is too short-lived a tribe for you never to have encroached upon the dogma of your dead god. I doubt your precious laws contain even a single word that has not been rewritten to oblige new generations of mon-keigh."
